sentences.en: a country rich in natural resources
All pollution is simply an unused resource.
sentences.cn: 所有的污染只不过是一种未被利用的资源.

sentences.en: At first blush , land is seen as a fixed or unalterable resource.
sentences.cn: 乍一看土地是一种固定的,或者说是不可改变的资源.
加拿大丰富的矿产资源

sentences.en: He is full of resource in any emergency.
sentences.cn: 他富有随机应变的才能.

sentences.en: Minnie was thinking of the resource which Carrie's board would add.
sentences.cn: 敏妮想的却是嘉莉在他们家搭伙,可以增加些家里的收入.

sentences.en: Physical capital is a scarce resource in rich and poor countries alike.
sentences.cn: 不论是在富国还是在穷国,物质资本都是一种稀缺的资源.

sentences.en: The objective of resource management is to conserve our resources.
sentences.cn: 资源管理的目的就在于保护好我们的资源.

sentences.en: The statute creates no private cause of action for natural resource damage.
sentences.cn: 法令并非导致自然资源破坏反应的秘密原因.

sentences.en: There is nothing deterministic about resource growth leading to higher output growth.
sentences.cn: 资源增长并非必然导致较高的产量增长.

sentences.en: There's a great shortage of resource materials in many schools.
sentences.cn: 很多学校物资都十分短缺。

sentences.en: This was his one resource against the depression which held him.
sentences.cn: 只有这么想,他才不致于沮丧透顶.

sentences.en: Venice is haemorrhaging the very resource which could save it: its own people.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯正在丧失它的立足之本，那就是它的人民。

sentences.en: Water is becoming an increasingly precious resource.
sentences.cn: 水正成为日益珍贵的资源。

sentences.en: We are not dismissing resource problems as inconsequential to development.
sentences.cn: 我们并不把资源问题贬为对发展无关紧要的问题.

sentences.en: When necessary, instinct is the most reliable resource you can fall back on.
sentences.cn: 必要时，最保险的办法就是凭直觉判断。

words.tran_cn: 资源丰富的；足智多谋的；机智的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 金融资源，资金来源；财务资源，财力资源
人力资源管理；人力调配
信息资源管理，资讯资源管理
资源利用，资源运用；资源运用性

trans.tran_cn: 资源，物力，财力，办法，智谋
trans.tran_en: something such as useful land, or minerals such as oil or coal, that exists in a country and can be used to increase its wealth
to provide money or other resources for something
